titleStmt.title: This most precious balsome is made in manner like a plaister for every ones conveniency, because they may carry it about with them wheresoever the please, and it is also made hard because if it were liquid, it would bee great inconvenience to carry it. The remedies of the said balsome.
titleStmt.author: Nicols, Francis.

notesStmt.note: "By license from the Parliament, and Lord Fairfax Generall."
Place and date of publication suggested by Wing (2nd ed.).
Reproduction of original in: Harvard University. Library.
